ygData.subject: A nice magic shield
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, I was wondering if anyone know where I could get a nice magic shield.  The only one I know of is the shiney shield that can be obtained off a
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all,

I was wondering if anyone know where I could get a nice magic shield. The
only one I know of is the shiney shield that can be obtained off a trainer
orc in CB. Are there any others around? Can you actually buy one from a
vender? Our bash is a great addition to our attacks, but unless your shield
is magic, you will be unable to hit invulnerable creatures such as ghouls
and iceboned skeletons.

Thanks

Bronze (Povar)
